title: Hard Delete RACING EVENT Node
user_story:
As an API contributor
I want to be able to delete a RACING EVENT
So I can clean up bad data, test data or redundant data
description:
* The selected RACING EVENT node is deleted when it actually exists. -> Status Code \`204\`
* All attached relationships are also deleted when the node is deleted.
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This case can happen when there exists no node with that ID or when the node is not from type RACING EVENT. -> Status Code \`404\`
